summary: Marius Arrel is an Imperial follower that uses a sword and shield. He is found in Dragonsreach in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
Marius Arrel is a very simple follower that can be found in the Dragonsreach in Whiterun. He is a melee fighter that uses a sword and a shield.
[size=2]
[list][*]light foot perk
[/*]
[*]essential
[/*]
[*]marriable (will open a general goods shop)
[/*]
[*]will tolerate criminal behavior
[/*]
[*]will return to Dragonsreach when you dismiss him
[/*]
[/list][/size]
Marius should work with or without any DLC. He should also be compatible with any follower mods as long as this mod is loaded before them.
author: BananaDongle
